verses.name: 2 Kings 13:13
verses.text: And Joash slept with his fathers; and Jeroboam sat upon his throne: and Joash was buried in Samaria with the kings of Israel.

verses.name: 2 Kings 13:14
verses.text: Now Elisha was fallen sick of his sickness whereof he died. And Joash the king of Israel came down unto him, and wept over his face, and said, O my father, my father, the chariot of Israel, and the horsemen thereof.

verses.name: 2 Kings 13:15
verses.text: And Elisha said unto him, Take bow and arrows. And he took unto him bow and arrows.
